results.content: This course gives the most essential information and basics of codeigniter.It is easy to learn and understand. Also the information on how to advance in learning after completion of the course is given.

results.content: The instruction was very good. However, I had expected something a little more original than registration and login scripts which are all over the web. Mind you, the directory map function was useful. I am exploring how to use that in one of my own apps. Also, while there is nothing wrong with using native PHP within a framework, I was hoping to learn a lot more about how to implement CI3 syntax. I guess my search continues. The instructor is actually very competent and explained concepts very clearly.

results.content:
I'm normally too lazy to write reviews, but I think the author really deserves recognition for this excellent course.

Studyeasy have obviously planned this course and thoroughly prepared before creating it. This shows through in that the lectures are concise and to the point. There is no extraneous waffle or irrelevant material.

Also, the course assumes you have a good grasp of basic PHP already (If you don't then you shouldn't be doing this course anyway). This gives the advantage that the presenter is not constantly explaining basic PHP concepts which should already be known. 

I also purchased another codeingniter course here on Udemy, and if find that other course to be rather frustrating in that content that really should be in a single lecture is split over 3, 4 or 5 really short lectures.

In 5 or so hours, this studyeasy course will give you a comprehensive grounding in how Codeigniter works. It goes into just enough depth that you should feel confident to start using it and applying it to your own projects.

The only constructive critisism I have (and it's really only a small thing) would be to not include the short graphic/audio intro segment in each lecture video. It's really not necessary. 

Other than that, I really recommend this course. Don't be put of by the fact that this course is only 5 hours long when others on here are much longer. Those longer courses are not well planned and are full of waffle. Really this course is all you need to get started.

response.content:
Thanks Jason for rating and leaving review for this course,

Jason, this is the best review we have received for a course till now, I am feeling fantastic after reading this. Thanks, this means a lot to me. We have posted this awesome review on our facebook page as well :) 

Regards
Chaand - Author

Regards
